DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether six month treatment antipsychotic medicine Seroquel ( quetiapine ) may affect schizophrenic patient 's glucose metabolism
DOC.criteria: In outpatient schizophrenia , 1865 year old , require change treatment due insufficient efficacy tolerability give sign informed consent . Known diabetes mellitus , high HbA1c , fast plasma glucose and/or high 2h glucoseOGTT . Previous use atypicals ( 3 month ) medication might influence glucose metabolism Contraindications nonresponsiveness treatment safety issue Expected noncompliance treatment and/or study procedure
